title: Add comprehensive API security testing methodology for GraphQL
impact: Established industry-standard GraphQL security testing procedures adopted by security professionals globally
description: The Web Security Testing Guide lacked coverage for GraphQL-specific vulnerabilities like introspection abuse, query depth attacks, and batching exploits. Authored a comprehensive testing methodology covering 15 GraphQL-specific attack vectors with practical exploitation techniques and remediation guidance. This addition fills a critical gap in web security testing documentation as GraphQL adoption accelerates across the industry.
